items.title: pace+lead
items.summary: pace+lead (he/him) is a sound designer by day and electronic experimentalist at night. He’s been a part of the electronic music scene in Odense for years and is a resident DJ at Odeology and Waterplz as well as co-founder of the latter. pace+lead breathes experimentation and has a borderless approach to genres in his own music. His latest EP-release "Escape" is a five track personal therapeutic flee into a universe of contrasts. A euphoric address where fast and rolling grooves live side by side with weird beats and dark pop with distorted vocals. The entanglement of the sonic entities is an industrial landscape driven by emotional expression. This exploration will be further explored in upcoming releases in 2024. Alien sounds, liquidy atmospheres and sticky grooves should be expected to hit your sensory canal system when he’s to be found behind the decks. The subgenres in his sets can vary from tribal techno to trippy trance and hacker electro but hypnosis is always the driving force of the pace+lead ufo. Link: https://on.soundcloud.com/FAangstSyQxnbhBfA
items.content_html:

items.title: Bilibili
items.summary: BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. Link: https://soundcloud.com/bilibilixx/mix
items.content_html:
BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. 
 
Link: https://soundcloud.com/bilibilixx/mix

items.title: SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL 30/8-1/9 2024
items.summary: SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL will be born on the 30st of August in the last summer days of the year 2024. The FESTIVAL is within cycling distance from SVENDBORG (south of Funen, Denmark), and takes place among firs and deciduous trees on Aserbo's beautiful grounds, where there is room for adventure between the viking barns and midieval tower. COCKTAILS – DANCEABLE DJs – BEACH – BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE – TENT PLACE IN SHADY FOREST - MEDIEVAL CASTLE TOWER DANCE FLOOR SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL is a small, exclusive festival! Follow this page for continuous updates on the DJ line-up, as well as INFO about when ticket sales start. Tickets: Purchase tickets via MobilePay: Choose ticket price: 600kr for all dayse 350kr for one day Supply your: NAME + SURNAME + EMAIL (example: john doe john@doe.com) in the message field! Send to Mobile Pay box: 2898YQ The payment is your ticket together with the details of the message field. Tickets include dinner and brunch. When you buy a ticket, you also become a member of the association SEKVENS. The festival is for adults only ... and no animals, apart from those already in the forest :-) Location (click image for directions) Contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
items.content_html:
SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL will be born on the 30st of August in the last summer days of the year 2024.
 
The FESTIVAL is within cycling distance from SVENDBORG (south of Funen, Denmark), and takes place among firs and deciduous trees on Aserbo's beautiful grounds, where there is room for adventure between the viking barns and midieval tower.

COCKTAILS – DANCEABLE DJs – BEACH – BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE – TENT PLACE IN SHADY FOREST - MEDIEVAL CASTLE TOWER DANCE FLOOR

 
SEKVENS DJ FESTIVAL is a small, exclusive festival!
Follow this page for continuous updates on the DJ line-up, as well as INFO about when ticket sales start.

Tickets:

Purchase tickets via MobilePay:
  1. Choose ticket price:
    600kr for all dayse
    350kr for one day
  2. Supply your:
    NAME + SURNAME + EMAIL (example: john doe john@doe.com)
    in the message field!
  3. Send to Mobile Pay box: 2898YQ
  4. The payment is your ticket together with the details of the message field.

Tickets include dinner and brunch. When you buy a ticket, you also become a member of the association SEKVENS.
The festival is for adults only ... and no animals, apart from those already in the forest :-)

Location (click image for directions)

Links

  • Facebook event 
  •  

Contact: asmusbusck+sekvensburo@gmail.com
